verses.verse: Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6378>flask<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H3332>poured<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Has not the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you a <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> His <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>?

"When you <S%H1980>go<s%> from me <S%H3117>today,<s%> then you will <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5973>close<s%> to Rachel's <S%H6900>tomb<s%> in the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> at <S%H6766>Zelzah;<s%> and they will <S%H559>say<s%> to you, 'The <S%H860>donkeys<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1245>look<s%> for have been <S%H4672>found.<s%> Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your father has <S%H1>ceased<s%> to be <S%H5203>concerned<s%> about the <S%H1697>donkeys<s%> and is <S%H860>anxious<s%> for you, <S%H1672>saying,<s%> <S%H559>"What<s%> shall I <S%H4100>do<s%> about my <S%H6213>son<s%>? "'

"Then you will <S%H2498>go<s%> on <S%H1973>further<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and you will <S%H935>come<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H436>oak<s%> of <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5927>going<s%> up to <S%H430>God<s%> at <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> will <S%H4672>meet<s%> you, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1423>kids,<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> a <S%H9311>jug<s%> of <S%H3196>wine;<s%>
and they will <S%H7592>greet<s%> <S%H7965><s%> you and <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8147>two<s%> [loaves] of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> which you will <S%H3947>accept<s%> from their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H310>"Afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> you will <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H5333>garrison<s%> is; and it shall be as soon as you have <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that you will <S%H6293>meet<s%> a <S%H9112>group<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> with <S%H5035>harp,<s%> <S%H8596>tambourine,<s%> <S%H2485>flute,<s%> and a <S%H3658>lyre<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and they will be <S%H5012>prophesying.<s%>

"Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H9484>come<s%> upon you <S%H9484>mightily,<s%> and you shall <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> with them and be <S%H2015>changed<s%> into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

"And it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to you, <S%H6213>do<s%> for yourself <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3027>occasion<s%> <S%H4672>requires;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is with you.

"And you shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to you to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%> You shall <S%H3176>wait<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to you and <S%H3045>show<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> you should <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

Then it <S%H1961>happened<s%> when he <S%H6437>turned<s%> his <S%H7926>back<s%> to <S%H1980>leave<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>changed<s%> his <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> about on that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H9112>group<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7122>met<s%> him; and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9484>came<s%> upon him <S%H9484>mightily,<s%> so that he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3045>knew<s%> him <S%H4480>previously<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H865><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H2009>now<s%> with the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> has <S%H1961>happened<s%> to the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>? Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>?"

And a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>there<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now, <S%H4310>who<s%> is their father?" <S%H1>Therefore<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H3651>became<s%> a <S%H1961>proverb:<s%> "Is <S%H4912>Saul<s%> <S%H7586>also<s%> among the <S%H1571>prophets<s%>?"
When he had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H5012>prophesying,<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place.<s%>

Now Saul's <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H575>"Where<s%> did you <S%H1980>go<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "To <S%H1245>look<s%> for the <S%H860>donkeys.<s%> When we <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they could not be <S%H369>found,<s%> we <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>"
And Saul's <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you."

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1730>uncle,<s%> "He <S%H5046>told<s%> us <S%H5046>plainly<s%> that the <S%H860>donkeys<s%> had been <S%H4672>found.<s%>" But he did not <S%H5046>tell<s%> him about the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> had <S%H559>mentioned.<s%>
Thereafter <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6817>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6817>together<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'I <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> that were <S%H3905>oppressing<s%> you.'

"But you <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3467>delivers<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H9567>calamities<s%> and your <S%H6869>distresses;<s%> yet you have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>'No,<s%> but <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us!' <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H3320>present<s%> yourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> and by your <S%H505>clans.<s%>"

Thus <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%> by lot.

Then he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> by its <S%H4940>families,<s%> and the <S%H4309>Matrite<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> was <S%H3920>taken;<s%> but when they <S%H1245>looked<s%> for him, he could not be <S%H4672>found.<s%>

Therefore they <S%H7592>inquired<s%> <S%H5750>further<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Has the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%>?" So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> he is <S%H2244>hiding<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> by the <S%H3627>baggage.<s%>"

So they <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> him from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and when he <S%H3320>stood<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he was <S%H1361>taller<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from his <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Do you <S%H7200>see<s%> him <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%>? <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> him among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>" So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "[Long] <S%H2421>live<s%> the <S%H4428>king!<s%>"

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> [them] in the <S%H5612>book<s%> and <S%H5117>placed<s%> [it] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H1390>Gibeah;<s%> and the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> [men] <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with him.

But certain <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> can <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H3467>deliver<s%> us?" And they <S%H959>despised<s%> him and did not <S%H935>bring<s%> him any <S%H4503>present.<s%> But he <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>silent.<s%>
